name: The Great Escape of Alim the Magnificient, as told by his aspirant
name_original: The Great Escape of Alim the Magnificient, as told by his aspirant
description:
Did I tell you about the time my master was pursued by hundreds of ghouls ? He held them off with only the power of his alchemy ! A single potion might hurt a ghoul, but their true power comes from their different combinations...

Hold mouse to aim 

Release to fire

QWER to add a potion to the mix (up to 2)

Leave us a screenshot below of how much you scored!
